FuncDef: This command enables the system to send RADIUS interim-update packets for IKEv2 remote-access tunnels. The RADIUS attributes in the interim-update packet are the same as acct-start. The value of the Acct-status-type in the interim-update message is 3.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the interval in minutes. Values-5 to 259200.
Specifies the jitter as the number of seconds when the system sends each interim-update packet. Values-0 to 3600.
